data.title: Browse 'Offbeat' Scripts
data.meta_description: Films that are 'offbeat' are different from the ordinary, usual, or expected. Read, study, and download screenplays and scripts that are considered offbeat.
data.text:
Offbeat

What Are ‘Offbeat’ Films?

One of the ‘Mood & Tone’ subgenres.

Films that are ‘offbeat’ are different from the ordinary, usual, or expected. Perhaps even a little… off. Knives Out (2019) and The Ballad of Buster Scruggs (2018) are good examples.

Browse the ‘Offbeat’ scripts archives:
